Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class PostServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.PostServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PostServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class PostServiceImpl extends Object implements PostServiceInterface
Implementation of the PostServiceInterface, providing services for managing posts.

This service offers functionalities such as creating, updating, deleting posts, and fetching post details for a given user. It utilizes caching for frequently accessed data to improve performance. The service also interacts with Kafka to publish events related to posts.

The service also handles post validation (media, user) and interacts with external services (via UserClient) to enrich post data with user information.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Constructor Details

    • PostServiceImpl

      @Autowired public PostServiceImpl(PostRepository postRepository, ValidationServiceImpl validationServiceImpl, org.springframework.kafka.core.KafkaTemplate<Long,Object> kafkaTemplate, UserClient userClient, PostProcessor postProcessor)
      Constructs a new PostServiceImpl with the specified dependencies.

      The constructor injects the required dependencies such as the repository for posts, validation services, Kafka template for event publishing, and a processor for handling post-related logic.

      Parameters:
      postRepository - the PostRepository for managing post entities
      validationServiceImpl - the service for validating posts
      kafkaTemplate - the KafkaTemplate for interacting with Kafka
      userClient - the UserClient for fetching user information
      postProcessor - the PostProcessor for processing post-related data

  • Method Details

    • getUserIdByPostId

      @Cacheable(value="postsByUserId", key="#userId") public Long getUserIdByPostId(Long postId)
      Retrieves the user ID associated with the given post ID.

      This method checks the post repository for the post with the given ID, and if found, returns the associated user ID. The result is cached to improve performance.

      Specified by:
      getUserIdByPostId in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to search for
      Returns:
      the user ID associated with the post

    • deleteAllByUserId

      @CacheEvict(value={"postsByUserId","openPostsByUserId","postCountByUserId","postUrlsByUserId"}, key="#userId") public void deleteAllByUserId(Long userId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Deletes all posts associated with a given user ID.

      This method retrieves all posts by the given user ID and deletes them. The cache entries related to the posts are evicted for consistency.

      Specified by:
      deleteAllByUserId in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts need to be deleted
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if no posts for the user are found

    • getUrlsByUserId

      @Cacheable(value="postUrlsByUserId", key="#userId") public List<String> getUrlsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of media URLs associated with posts by the given user ID.

      This method checks the post repository for all posts by the user and returns a list of their media URLs. The result is cached to improve performance.

      Specified by:
      getUrlsByUserId in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose media URLs are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of media URLs associated with the user's posts
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found

    • getCountPostByUserId

      @Cacheable(value="postCountByUserId", key="#userId") public Integer getCountPostByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves the count of posts for the given user ID.

      This method checks the post repository for the count of posts by the given user and returns the count. The result is cached to improve performance.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • openAllPostsByUserId

      @Cacheable(value="openPostsByUserId", key="#userId") public List<OpenPostDTO> openAllPostsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of posts made by the given user ID and formats them for display.

      This method fetches all posts made by the user and processes them into a list of OpenPostDTO objects. The result is cached for improved performance.

      Specified by:
      openAllPostsByUserId in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of formatted posts made by the user
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - if no posts are found for the user

    • openPost

      @Cacheable(value="postById", key="#postId") public OpenPostDTO openPost(Long postId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Retrieves a specific post by its ID and formats it for display.

      This method fetches a post by its ID and formats it into an OpenPostDTO object. The result is cached to improve performance.

      Specified by:
      openPost in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to retrieve
      Returns:

      public boolean postVerification(Long postId)
      Verifies the existence of a post with the given post ID.

      This method checks if a post with the specified ID exists in the repository.

      Specified by:
      postVerification in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to verify
      Returns:

    • createPost

      @CacheEvict(value="postsByUserId", key="#createPostDTO.userId", allEntries=true) public void createPost(CreatePostDTO createPostDTO)
      Creates a new post with the specified data.

      This method validates the media URL and user data, and creates a new post in the repository. A "post.created" event is then published to Kafka to notify other services of the new post creation.

      Specified by:
      createPost in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createPostDTO - the data for the new post

    • updatePost

      @CacheEvict(value="postById", key="#postId") public void updatePost(Long userId, UpdatePostDTO updatePostDTO) throws PostNotFoundException
      Updates an existing post with the specified data.

      This method updates the content and media URL of an existing post and publishes a "post.updated" event to Kafka to notify other services of the update.

      Specified by:
      updatePost in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user requesting the update
      updatePostDTO - the data to update the post with
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if the post with the given ID is not found

    • deletePost

      @CacheEvict(value="postById", key="#postId") public void deletePost(Long postId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Deletes a post by its ID.

      This method deletes the post from the repository and publishes a "post.deleted" event to Kafka to notify other services of the post deletion.

      Specified by:
      deletePost in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to delete
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if the post with the given ID is not found

    • getPostsByUserId

      @Cacheable(value="postsByUserIdList", key="#userId") public List<CreatePostDTO> getPostsByUserId(Long userId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of posts made by a specific user and formats them for display.

      This method fetches all posts by the user and processes them into a list of DTOs for easy display. The result is cached to improve performance.

      Specified by:
      getPostsByUserId in interface PostServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of formatted posts made by the user
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if no posts for the user are found
